name: Bench Press
description: Lie on a bench and press the barbell upwards from chest level until arms are fully extended.

name: Squat
description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, lower your hips back and down, then return to standing.

name: Deadlift
description: Lift the barbell from the ground to hip level while keeping your back straight.

name: Shoulder Press
description: Press the barbell overhead from shoulder height until arms are fully extended.

name: Pull Ups
description: Hang from a bar and pull your body up until your chin is above the bar.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
description: Lie on a bench and press dumbbells upwards from chest level until arms are fully extended.

name: Dumbbell Curl
description: Hold dumbbells at your sides and curl them up towards your shoulders.

name: Push Ups
description: Lower and raise your body using your arms while keeping your body straight.

name: Sled Leg Press
description: Push the sled away with your feet while seated, extending your legs fully.

name: Barbell Curl
description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and curl the barbell up towards your shoulders.

name: Incline Dumbbell Bench Press
description: Lie on an incline bench and press dumbbells upwards from chest level.

name: Bent Over Row
description: Bend at the waist and pull the barbell towards your lower chest.

name: Dips
description: Lower and raise your body using your arms on parallel bars.

name: Incline Bench Press
description: Lie on an incline bench and press the barbell upwards from chest level.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
description: Press dumbbells overhead from shoulder height until arms are fully extended.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: Pull the bar down towards your chest while seated, keeping your back straight.

name: Front Squat
description: Hold the barbell at shoulder height and squat down, keeping your chest up.

name: Hex Bar Deadlift
description: Stand inside a hex bar and lift it by extending your hips and knees.

name: Chin Ups
description: Hang from a bar with palms facing you and pull your body up until your chin is above the bar.

name: Hip Thrust

name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
description: Raise dumbbells out to the sides until arms are parallel to the floor.

name: Leg Extension
description: Extend your legs by pushing against a padded bar while seated.

name: Romanian Deadlift
description: Lower the barbell by bending at the hips while keeping your back straight.

name: Power Clean
description: Lift the barbell from the floor to shoulder height in one explosive movement.

name: Horizontal Leg Press
description: Push a weighted platform away with your feet while seated.

name: Dumbbell Row
description: Bend forward and pull a dumbbell towards your lower chest.

name: Military Press
description: Press the barbell overhead from shoulder height while standing.

name: Sumo Deadlift
description: Stand with a wide stance and lift the barbell from the ground to hip level.

name: Chest Press

name: Tricep Pushdown

name: Hammer Curl

name: Seated Cable Row

name: Crunches

name: Sit Ups

name: Muscle Ups

name: Hack Squat

name: Dumbbell Bulgarian Split Squat

name: Seated Leg Curl

name: Bent Arm Barbell Pullover
description: Lie on a bench and pull a barbell over your head to your chest with bent arms.

name: Ring Muscle Ups
description: Perform a pull-up on rings followed by a dip to transition above the rings.

name: Dumbbell Thruster
description: Perform a squat with dumbbells and press them overhead as you stand.

name: Decline Dumbbell Fly
description: Lie on a decline bench and perform a fly motion with dumbbells to target the chest.

name: Dumbbell High Pull
description: Pull dumbbells from waist to chest height with elbows leading the movement.

name: Dumbbell Face Pull
description: Pull dumbbells towards your face, keeping elbows high to target the rear delts.

name: Dumbbell External Rotation
description: Hold a dumbbell and rotate your arm outward to strengthen the rotator cuff.

name: Dumbbell Hang Clean
description: Lift dumbbells from a hanging position to shoulder height in one fluid motion.

name: Dumbbell Walking Calf Raise
description: Hold dumbbells and perform calf raises while walking forward.

name: Dumbbell Push Press
description: Dip slightly and use your legs to help press dumbbells overhead.

name: Dumbbell Incline Y Raise
description: Lie on an incline bench and raise dumbbells in a Y shape to target the shoulders.

name: Dumbbell Clean and Press
description: Lift the dumbbells from the floor to your shoulders, then press them overhead in one fluid motion.

name: Cable External Rotation
description: Attach a cable to a low pulley, hold the handle with your elbow bent, and rotate your arm outward.

name: Flutter Kicks
description: Lie on your back and alternate kicking your legs up and down in a fluttering motion.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: Start in a plank position and quickly alternate bringing your knees to your chest.

name: Donkey Calf Raise
description: Lean forward with your hands on a support and raise your heels to work your calves.

name: Superman
description: Lie face down and simultaneously lift your arms and legs off the ground, holding briefly.

name: Scissor Kicks
description: Lie on your back and cross your legs over each other in a scissor-like motion.
